nodes.text: Hunter Squadron was an ad hoc starfighter squadron formed by elements of Rogue Squadron during their infiltration of Imperial Center in 7 ABY. The group flew Z-95 Headhunters, and Corran Horn served as Hunter Lead. They held off TIE fighters and interceptors while other Rogues brought down the world's planetary shields. Its other members were Asyr Sei'lar, Pash Cracken, Rhysati Ynr, and Erisi Dlarit. Sabotage conducted by Dlarit—actually an Imperial spy—led to Horn's fighter crashing and his imprisonment in Lusankya.
